alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 9:42AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Fort Bend, southeastern Montgomery, southwestern San Jacinto, northwestern Brazoria, southwestern Liberty and Harris Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 941 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cut And Shoot to 7 miles northeast of Katy to near Cumings. Movement was east southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Pasadena, Pearland, Sugar Land, Missouri City, southeastern Conroe, Rosenberg, Stafford, South Houston, Bellaire, Humble, West University Place, Richmond, Galena Park, Tomball, Jacinto City, Cleveland, Jersey Village, Manvel, Hunters Creek Village and Bunker Hill Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto
